thread.title: Trade Your Samsung Galaxy For A OnePlus 2 Anyone?
thread.title_full: Trade Your Samsung Galaxy For A OnePlus 2 Anyone?

author: Admin
title: Trade Your Samsung Galaxy For A OnePlus 2 Anyone?
text:
Mobiles & Tablets , News 
OnePlus has a proposition for you, if you happen to own a Samsung Galaxy 2015 model and don’t feel the excitement, you can now trade in for a OnePlus 2 under the Take The Edge Off promotion. 
Basically, owners of Galaxy S6, S6 Edge, S6 Edge + and Note 5 can trade their devices in return for a brand new OnePlus 2, cheeky ain’t it? This blatant attempt is probably to equate the phone makers devices being just as good as any Samsung flagship, after all OnePlus does claim to be a flagship killer. Not entirely malice, the traded Samsung phones will be donated to Hope Phones a non profit organisation that recycles mobile phones and use the funds for medical programs in Africa, Asia and Latin America. 
Trade-in deals are not new, with Samsung themselves offer owners of Apple phones cash upfront as sweeteners to buy their latest Galaxy phones instead. As for OnePlus there is a price difference on the devices, and this promo will only interest those who were disappointed on the smartphone they bought or for those looking at contributing for a good cause. Interested? Log on to OnePlus site fill up some forms and you can be part of this program.
